title: Bruno Carotti
text: Bruno Carotti (born 30 September 1972 in <a href="Palma%20de%20Mallorca">Palma de Mallorca</a>, <a href="Spain">Spain</a>) is a retired <a href="France">French</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He is currently the sporting director of <a href="Montpellier%20HSC">Montpellier</a>.
